reasons_to_visit.details: May offers ideal temperatures and sunshine for all outdoor activities and sightseeing.
World-renowned classical music festival featuring international orchestras and performances.
All parks and gardens are in full bloom, creating beautiful natural settings throughout the city.
Restaurant terraces and beer gardens open with perfect weather for al fresco dining.
Extended daylight hours provide more time for sightseeing and activities.

reasons_to_avoid.details: May marks the beginning of peak tourist season with larger crowds at major attractions.
Accommodation and dining prices rise significantly as peak season approaches.
